item.title: Kalamanthan | The art platform of India - Where every art meets its worth!
item.description: KalaManthan is the first platform of its kind in India, whose team works towards bridging this gap between the art creators and art seekers. Kalamanthan will have artist and its patrons as two ends. With our strong panelists from different genre, who will review your content, you will be provided guidance and support and your selected creativity will be available to a larger audience & true art seekers.
